00001 #ifndef AC_SIMD_DDS_WRITER_IMPL_HPP
00002 #define AC_SIMD_DDS_WRITER_IMPL_HPP

00004 #include <dds/runtime.hpp>
00005 #include <dds/memory.hpp>

00007 #include <dds/topic.hpp>
00008 #include <dds/publisher.hpp>
00009 
00010 namespace dds {
00011   namespace peer {
00012     template <typename T>
00013     class DataWriterImpl;
00014   }
00015 }
00016 
00017 template <typename T>
00018 class dds::peer::DataWriterImpl 
00019 {
00020 public:
00021   typedef typename topic_data_writer<T>::type DW;
00022   
00023 public:
00024   
00025   DataWriterImpl(const dds::Topic<T>& topic)
00026     : topic_(topic),
00027       dwqos_(topic_->get_qos())
00028   {
00029     pub_ =
00030       ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_publisher();
00031     
00032     DDS::DataWriter* w = 
00033       pub_->create_datawriter(topic_->get_dds_topic(),
00034                               dwqos_,
00035                               0,
00036                               DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00037     
00038     //    native_writer_ = DW::_narrow(w);
00039     boost::shared_ptr<DW> tmp(DW::_narrow(w), mem::DWDeleter(pub_));
00040     writer_ = tmp;
00041   }
00042     
00043   DataWriterImpl(const dds::Topic<T>& topic, const dds::DataWriterQos& qos)
00044     : topic_(topic), dwqos_(qos)
00045   {
00046     pub_ = 
00047       ::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_publisher();
00048     DDS::DataWriter* w =
00049       pub_->create_datawriter(topic_->get_dds_topic(),
00050                               dwqos_,
00051                               0,
00052                               DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00053     
00054     
00055     Assert::postcondition((w != 0), "Unable to create DataWriter", __FILE__);
00056     Assert::postcondition((DW::_narrow(w) != 0), "Unable to Narrow DataWriter", __FILE__);
00057     
00058     boost::shared_ptr<DW> tmp(DW::_narrow(w),
00059                               mem::DWDeleter(pub_));
00060     writer_ = tmp;
00061   }
00062     
00063   DataWriterImpl(const dds::Topic<T>& topic, 
00064                  const dds::DataWriterQos& qos, 
00065                  const boost::shared_ptr<DDS::Publisher>& pub)
00066     :   topic_(topic), pub_(pub), dwqos_(qos)
00067   {
00068     DDS::DataWriter* w =
00069       pub_->create_datawriter(topic_->get_dds_topic(),
00070                               dwqos_,
00071                               0,
00072                               DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00073       
00074     boost::shared_ptr<DW> tmp(DW::_narrow(w),
00075                               mem::DWDeleter(pub_));
00076     writer_ = tmp;
00077   }
00078     
00079   ~DataWriterImpl() { }
00080 
00081 public:
00082 
00083   inline DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00084   write(const T& sample) 
00085   {
00086     return writer_->write(sample, DDS::HANDLE_NIL);
00087   }
00088     
00089   inline DDS::ReturnCode_t 
00090   write(const T& sample, 
00091         const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) 
00092   {
00093     return writer_->write_w_timestamp(sample, DDS::HANDLE_NIL, timestamp);
00094   }
00095     
00096 
00097   DataInstanceWriter<T>
00098   register_instance(const T& key) 
00099   {
00100     DataInstanceWriter<T> iwriter(writer_, key);
00101     return iwriter;
00102   }
00103     
00104   // -- QoS Getter/Setter
00105     
00106   DataWriterQos
00107   get_qos() 
00108   {
00109     return dwqos_;
00110   }
00111 
00112   DDS::ReturnCode_t
00113   set_qos(const DataWriterQos &qos)  
00114   {
00115     DDS::ReturnCode_t rc = writer_->set_qos(qos);
00116     if (rc == DDS::RETCODE_OK)
00117       dwqos_ = qos;
00118     return rc;
00119   }
00120 
00121   boost::shared_ptr<dds::Topic<T> >
00122   get_topic() 
00123   {
00124     return topic_;
00125   }
00126     
00127   dds::Publisher get_publisher() 
00128   {
00129     return pub_;
00130   }
00131 
00132   DDS::ReturnCode_t
00133   wait_for_acks(const DDS::Duration_t& timeout) 
00134   {
00135     return writer_->wait_for_acknowlegments(timeout);
00136   }
00137 
00138 protected:
00139   dds::Topic<T>              topic_;
00140   dds::Publisher             pub_;
00141   ::boost::shared_ptr<DW>    writer_;
00142   DW*                        native_writer_;
00143   dds::DataWriterQos         dwqos_;
00144 };
